categories: Category:5-Minute Star Wars Stories Strike Back

nodes.text: "Mission to Maz" is a canon short story written by S.T. Bende and published in 5-Minute Star Wars Stories Strike Back.

It was previously published under the name "Chaos at the Castle" in 5-Minute Star Wars Villain Stories, witch re-used artwork from the book of the same name. When it was republished in 5-Minute Star Wars Stories Strike Back, the artwork was slightly changed.
